name: Negative Dungeon
description:
Negative Dungeon is an atmospheric mix of hardcore platformer and math game. You are a little girl in an abandoned city of woodcutters at the foot of a volcano, who needs to break the necessary blocks on a level in an easy math problem in the allotted time. And try not to die in the process ...

Control:

A / D - movement

Space - jump

Space + Space - double jump

Shift - dash

LMB - shot

RMB - shot line

R - restart level

T - next level

Esc - exit to the menu

Note:

- To launch the desired level through the Menu, you must select the level number, and then press Play

- To solve the example, you need to destroy the extra blocks with numbers in the equation (2 + 2 = 14 => 2 + 2 = 4)
